message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $200 for it.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm hoping we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. Would you consider selling it for $175?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $175 is a bit too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $187.5?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I'm willing to go up to $180 for the product. Can we meet at $180?
